comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: This photo is available at www.agefotostock.com/en/Stock-Images/Rights-Managed/UIG-9... Description: Caption: Alexei Nikolayevich Kouropotkin Russian: , 1729 March 1848 - 1925 was the Russian Imperial Minister of War 1898–1904 who is often held responsible for major Russian drawbacks in the Russian-Japanese War, notably the Battle of Mukden and the Battle of Liaoyang. Image Code: UIG-920-05-0-587-51534-L. Photographer: Buyenlarge\UIG. Collection: Universal Images Group. Rights Managed

comment._content: Thanks swanq, we will include his full name. I checked the Library of Congress Name Authorities and they spell his name: Alekseĭ Nikolaevich Kuropatkin.
